channel.title: CVE Feed for apollo13themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for apollo13themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5504|2024-07-06T03:06:23.535Z -- apollo13themes -- rife%20elementor%20extensions%20%26%20templates
item.description: The Rife Elementor Extensions & Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tag' attribute within the plugin's Writing Effect Headline widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5504|2024-07-02T07:37:03.053Z -- apollo13themes -- rife%20elementor%20extensions%20%26%20templates
item.description: The Rife Elementor Extensions & Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tag' attribute within the plugin's Writing Effect Headline widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-35708|2024-06-08T14:04:07.467Z -- apollo13themes -- rife%20free
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in apollo13themes Rife Free allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Rife Free: from n/a through 2.4.19.

item.title: CVE-2024-24880|2024-06-04T17:42:59.179Z -- apollo13themes -- apollo13%20framework%20extensions
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Apollo13Themes Apollo13 Framework Extensions allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Apollo13 Framework Extensions: from n/a through 1.9.2.
